inclusion.criterion: History of colonic / anterior resection with low pelvic anastomosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinical requirement for assessment of anastomotic integrity
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Known inability to tolerate MRI (e.g. claustrophobia)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known inability to maintain anal continence
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy and severe urethral stricture. He will require surgical fixation of the stricture when stable.
